item.title: Old fridge, 29th November
item.description:
Dumped old fridge outside 18 Osterley Road. Hackney need to get control of the constant rubbish dumped on every corner and by every tree! You need to bring back the skip service you use to offer to try and stop this. The borough looks terrible

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Osterley Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Youngster dropping excessive flyers, 29th November
item.description:
Twice in the last week, weve found dozens of flyers from the same company in our letterbox. For today's drop (see photo), I have a video of the individual doing it. Happy to share with authorities if helpful.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hunters Meadow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 29th November
item.description:
Just after the zebra crossing going towards Southgate a pothole is getting bigger, drove over it today, was expecting the tyre to deflate, quite surprised when it didn’t with the almighty bang as I drove over it, my poor car
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chase Side, Cockfosters, Greater London

item.title: Corner of Kingsley and Priory Park Rd, 29th November
item.description:
Vast amount of fly tipping. Too dark to take a picture. This is a reoccurring issue. Please add cctv to this area to prevent this activity. It’s disgusting.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic barriers left behind by an unknown person/company, 29th November
item.description:
Hello. As evident in the photograph, someone left these barriers behind since the summer months. Neither us nor the neighbours are aware of who these belong to. Please would it be possible to arrange to remove these as they are unpleasant to have on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Devonshire Road, Goddington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes left in car parking space, 29th November
item.description:
Lime bikes are consistently being deposited - by Lime or a contractor - in car or motorcycle parking spaces. This is a repeated issue - they reappear every couple of days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Flaxman Road, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
